items.sentence: It\'s essential that you understand the situation.
Tom is living in a small apartment on Park Street.
Tom is still financially dependent on his parents.
Tom is wearing the black coat he bought last week.
I\'m surprised that Tom didn\'t enjoy the concert.
There\'s something I\'d like to talk to you about.
This car is my father\'s, but it\'ll soon be mine.
Have you ever served as a witness in a court case?
He cleared his throat before starting the lecture.
He failed in his attempt to swim across the river.
He memorized that poem when he was five years old.
I tore a hole in my jeans when I fell off my bike.
I tried to convince Tom to go to Boston with Mary.
I try to write at least three blog entries a week.
I used to go for a walk every morning before work.
I used to keep a diary every day when I was young.
I used to play the piano a lot when I was younger.
I assume you\'ve heard about what happened to Tom.
Tom was hospitalized with symptoms of dehydration.
Tom was killed in a car crash last year in Boston.
Tom was never able to tell Mary that he loved her.
Tom was paid three hundred dollars for doing that.
Tom was released from prison on October twentieth.
I think you need to find yourself a part-time job.
I took it for granted that you would come with us.
I was about to go outside when it started raining.
Tom said that he\'s looking forward to seeing you.
Tom said you didn\'t want to go to Boston with us.
Tom carefully checked that the gas was turned off.
Tom certainly had a lot of time to think about it.
Have you visited any of your relatives this month?
He can run 100 meters in less than twelve seconds.
Tom must\'ve known Mary wouldn\'t want to do that.
I\'d like to study with you tonight, but I can\'t.
Tom thought the car Mary was driving wasn\'t safe.
Tom told Mary he didn\'t want her to go to Boston.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t have anything to do.
Wouldn\'t it be nice to live in a house like that?
Tom wants to have another baby, but Mary doesn\'t.
All the songs we sang tonight were written by Tom.
Anyone can learn to juggle with a bit of practice.
Anyone stupid enough to go there is asking for it.
Why don\'t you just come clean and tell the truth?
Why don\'t you just tell me the rest of the story?
Why don\'t you meet me out front in a few minutes?
Why don\'t you start by telling us where you went?
Why don\'t you tell me where you got that diamond?
I used to ride my bike to my grandparents\' house.
I used to walk past Tom\'s house almost every day.
Tom decided to learn all he could about computers.
